currentPost.title: Doctor Genius Enhanced Portal Review Webinar & Dental Practice Financing
currentPost.excerpt: With the services we provide at Doctor Genius, clients have the tools to branch out in the digital media platform [ More.. ]
currentPost.content:
With the services we provide at Doctor Genius, clients have the tools to branch out in the digital media platform and enhance their online presence. With that in mind, we understand that there may not be enough time in a client’s day to understand all of the possible functions our portal services offer. Thus, Doctor Genius is teaming up with guest speaker Blake E. Vargo, Regional Manager of Dental Practice Financing at Bank of America, for a webinar that goes over the functions of the Doctor Genius Portal itself and effective methods for enhancing one’s dental practice.

The technology behind the portal

The webinar will take place from 11 a.m. to 12 p.m., on Wednesday, Jan. 18, 2017. While we are always available to answer clients’ questions about the portal outside of this webinar, clients will not be able to gather together with like-minded individuals and receive advice from Blake.  In this webinar, we will be covering:
  • Reporting
  • Running promos
  • Submitting Support tickets
  • The most commonly asked questions by Doctor Genius clients
  • Enhancing one’s dental practice
This webinar is an excellent opportunity for clients to share any and all questions with us. Clients attending this webinar will be able to refresh their memory on functions of the portal and learn about possible new functions. As the dental practice market continues to change over time, it is important to understand all functions of one’s Doctor Genius Portal and have the ability to fully utilize the technology.

 

Guest speaker on dental practice financing in today’s market

There are always methods for enhancing the mechanics of one’s practice; we will help find the best methods. Our Doctor Genius Portal allows clients to review reports and effectively communicate with our support team with any questions. One area of Dental Practice Management that can fuel or inhibit a practice is Finances. With advice and important facts on financing, we also have an experienced guest speaker during the webinar, Blake E. Vargo, who specializes in Dental Practice Financing. Blake will review a variety of topics including:
  • Refinancing methods and benefits
  • Taking advantage of better interest rates that are predicted to increase over time
  • Offering special incentives for refinancing
Blake will also explain how Bank of America is the largest dental practice financier in the market and what they can do for your practice. In today’s market, it is crucial for owners of a dental practice to understand the necessary steps and overall benefits of refinancing. Do not miss out on the opportunity to hear Blake speak and gain helpful tips to better the management of one’s practice. Old and new clients can learn more about the Doctor Genius Portal and how they continue active roles in furthering the success of their practice by attending this webinar. If you are interested in reviewing the functions of the Doctor Genius Portal or have any questions about our services, then click here to register on our GoToWebinar link. The Event: Doctor Genius Enhanced Portal Review Webinar When: Wednesday, Jan. 18, 2017 from 11 a.m. to 12 p.m. Where: Webinar

Doctor Genius

At Doctor Genius, we work with clients to expand their private practice or business by helping them reach, engage and convert consumers into patients to their practice doorstep. By offering high-end web marketing services to medical and health professionals throughout the United States, we help clients gain more profit and build trustworthy relationships with patients to initiate sustainable practice growth. We construct a website for your practice, establish an active online presence, build and constantly update several social media pages, help you build stronger connections with patients, streamline the appointment scheduling process, funnel traffic from search engines directly to your practice website and much more. To begin the process of increasing the success and presence of your practice, give us a call at 877-477-2311.

prevPost.title: Getting Your Patients Through The Door: A Recall System That Actually Works!
prevPost.excerpt: As a dental practice, getting patients through the door for the first appointment is great but not the only necessity. [ More.. ]
prevPost.content:
As a dental practice, getting patients through the door for the first appointment is great but not the only necessity. You need to have patients who will return for checkups after the initial visit. A strong Recall System will allow you to establish strong bonds of trust with the patient as a professional practice and ensure Patient Recall. While professionals can attempt to schedule appointments months ahead, the patient may move to another practice or cancel the appointment. Doctor Genius is hosting a webinar event for clients to learn new tips and methods for an improved Patient Recall System.

The webinar event you don’t want to miss

Patient Recall is a crucial step of anyone’s practice and not having an effective system in place can hinder the chance of patients returning. We will cover tips and methods for developing an effective Patient Recall System that will help retain patients and bring more through the doors. The webinar event will take place from 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. on Thursday, Jan. 26, 2017. A few simple steps that are essential for effective patient recall include:
  • Phone call reminders for a regular dental checkup
  • Sending postcards with practice contact info to patients with reminder
  • Creating an automated recall system
  • Adding patients who do not reply to all reminders onto an overdue recall list
While many professional practices may pre-schedule the phone, email, or postcard reminders about an appointment, patients may still end up canceling. This webinar will cover how to implement effective recall methods into a practice.

New recall tactics from a professional consultant

Professional consultant, David Orr, owner of Alliance Dental Consulting in Irvine, CA, works to understand and develop dental practices to help them reach greater levels of success. Orr will share tips on his confirmation system with listeners during the webinar. The confirmation system begins by sending a card in the mail or an email to the patient 28 days before the appointment, requesting confirmation. Since some patients may not respond immediately, consistency is key. Orr will also cover steps with basic recall, overdue recall, responding to missed appointments, unscheduled treatment and more. Orr will go over how to effectively continue keeping up contacting with the patient and increasing patient recall with his system in the webinar. At Doctor Genius, we produce professional content for dental practices and help practices create a stronger online presence. If you are interested in joining this webinar for more on patient recall, feel free to register online at our GoToWebinar.com link today.   The Event: Getting Your Patients Through The Door, A Recall System That Actually Works! When: Thursday, Jan. 26, 2017 from 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. Where: Webinar

nextPost.title: The Doctor’s Guide for Marketing to Millennials
nextPost.excerpt: With the changing market, medical professionals need to know how to draw in more clients. Even with a website and [ More.. ]
nextPost.content:
With the changing market, medical professionals need to know how to draw in more clients. Even with a website and digital presence, medical professionals will experience difficulty in reaching clients of all ages. The fastest growing buying group in the market and the age group professionals seem to have difficulty marketing to more than others, is millennials. Fortunately, Doctor Genius is working with other companies to offer a CE event on the best methods for marketing to millennials.

Event details

The event itself takes place at the Marriott Courtyard in Sherman Oaks, CA, from 6 p.m. to 9 p.m. on February 16, 2016. The registration fee is $25, which includes dinner provided at the event. Others can attend this continuing education (CE) class to earn three credits as well. The focus of the event is to showcase proven marketing methods that attract and return millennial clients including:
  1. Active websites packed with fresh, unique and tailored content for specific practices
  2. Effective branding strategies to give practices an edge in competitive markets
  3. The importance of active social media profiles
  4. The most effective retention methods to promote client loyalty
  5. The use of search marketing to find the keywords that clients select most
  6. Management of your practice reviews to follow what current clients are saying
This event will cover many more topics and information on reaching millennial clients. For the event, Doctor Genius is collaborating with Patterson Dental, Bank of America, Nickerson Consulting, Revenue Well and CARR Healthcare Realty. Experienced speakers from these companies, operating in today’s competitive market, will present proven methods of reaching and retaining millennial clients.

Easier said than done

The PEW Research Center finds that 81 percent of millennials are on Facebook and that only 19 percent of millennials “say that most people can be trusted.” This statistic makes it even more crucial for medical professionals to be able to build a strong bond to retain millennial clients. Millennials are a large group of possible clients who mainly connect with each other over social media platforms. A practice that has a successful online presence and active accounts in the digital market can effectively reach millennials. While most people can construct a website for any known service, keeping the website active, healthy, updated and on the first page of search results is difficult to do. Doctor Genius offers these services and more, using this CE event to go over the most effective methods for maintaining a strong presence among millennial clients. The event will have a plethora of advice from top industry speakers and marketing advice from companies of various backgrounds. Visit our CE Event Page for more information or the Eventbrite Event Registration page to register. The Event: Doctor’s Guide for Marketing to Millennials When: February 16, 2017 6 p.m. to 9 p.m. Where: Courtyard Marriott at 15433 Ventura Blvd., Sherman Oaks, CA 91403 Registration Fee: $25, (includes dinner)
